options.rtfw.title: RTFW Options
options.rtfw.requires_confirmation.name: Requires confirmation
options.rtfw.requires_confirmation.descr: Open confirmation screen before opening the wiki article. This is useful to avoid accidentally triggering the feature.
options.rtfw.language.name: Wiki language
options.rtfw.language.description: Set your preferred language, overriding game language setting.
options.rtfw.open_keybinds.name: Go to keybinds settings
options.rtfw.open_keybinds.description: Open the keybinds settings page to configure RTFW's keybinds.
